main.name: Devarsh Patel
main.description: Experienced Full Stack Developer by Day, Investor && Freelancer by Night. #keepshining
main.bio: Hi, I am Devarsh Patel. You can call me Dev as I am a Full Stack Developer with expertise in Web and Mobile app development. My top skills includes React.js, React Native, CSS, Node.js and PHP. I would love to convert your business idea into real world business application. Feel free to contact me.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to stay updated

resume.skillmessage: I am experienced Full Stack Developer with 2 years of well-rounded professional experience. Below are list of my top notch skills. Apart from technical skills I do have a solid understanding of MVC architecture, agile methodology and have a strong problem solving skills.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Developing real world delivery service app using React, Typescript, Node.js and React Native

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Responsible for developing dynamic websites and involed in all aspects of software development ranging from database design to product deployment which also includes client meetings, code reviews and quality assurance.

projects.title: City Directory
projects.category: City directory to show neary by places, restaurants, and other useful stuf around the city using google place API

projects.title: Dark theme based Portfolio
projects.category: Portfolio website built using pure HTML, CSS and JavaScript and hosted on github pages

projects.title: Company Website and Delivery app
projects.category: Delivery service app using React.js, Node.js,React-Native and TypeScript

projects.title: Pythia - SAAS for Wireless instruction device
projects.category: Back-end and Admin Panel for organization

projects.title: Amazon Clone
projects.category: Currently building Amazon clone for fun

testimonials.text: I wish him best for his Master's in Canada. Hope he will continue working for our company software which he made so neat and easy to use. I and my employees will thankful for him for making great user friendly HR system for our company.

Devarsh must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It was amazing to work with him. The way he involve in my business working before developing my event firm website is making him ideal freelancer. Wishing you more success Devarsh!
